body:
Installing openfoam-com with Spack fails if an old flex version is in the system path:
```
error: declaration is incompatible with "void yySTLFlexLexer::switch_streams(std::istream *, std::ostream *)" (declared at line 129 of "/usr/include/FlexLexer.h")
```
However, spack reports that the installation completed successfully. That's not the case.

I am not familiar with the build system of OpenFOAM. @olesenm is there a possibility to make the build system finding the Spack version of Flex?
title: openfoam-com finds wrong flex
